languages.text: "Чего уставились, попрошайки? Окончили смену — возвращайтесь в бараки. Пришли на смену — отметьтесь у бригадира и идите работать, пока Мотильда не погладила вас по хребту".

traits.locale_text: "Чего уставились, попрошайки? Окончили смену — возвращайтесь в бараки, из которых выползли. Пришли на смену — отметьтесь у бригадира и идите работать, пока Матильда не погладила вас по хребту".

languages.text: "What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."
languages.original_text: "Чего уставились, попрошайки? Окончили смену — возвращайтесь в бараки. Пришли на смену — отметьтесь у бригадира и идите работать, пока Мотильда не погладила вас по хребту".

traits.locale_text: "What are you looking at, you beggars? You finished your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and start labouring before Motilda pats you on the back."
"What are you looking at, you beggars? You finished your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and start labouring before Motilda pats you on the back."

"What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and start labouring before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."

"What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and start labouring before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."
"What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."
"What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."

languages.text: "Was guckt Ihr so, Ihr Bettler? Wenn Eure Schicht zu Ende ist, geht in die Kaserne. Wenn Eure Schicht beginnt, meldet Euch beim Vorarbeiter und macht Euch an die Arbeit, ehe Motilda kommt, um Euch auf die Schultern zu klopfen."
languages.original_text: "What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."

traits.locale_text: "Was guckt Ihr so, Ihr Bettler? Wenn Eure Schicht zu Ende ist, geht in die Kaserne. Wenn Eure Schicht beginnt, meldet Euch beim Vorarbeiter und macht Euch an die Arbeit, ehe Motilda kommt, um Euch auf die Schultern zu klopfen."

languages.text: «¿Qué miráis, mendigos? Si termináis el turno, volved al barracón. Si empezáis el turno, vais con el capataz y os ponéis a trabajar antes de que Motilda os dé una palmadita en la espalda».
languages.original_text: "What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué miráis, mendigos? Si termináis el turno, volved al barracón. Si empezáis el turno, vais con el capataz y os ponéis a trabajar antes de que Motilda os dé una palmadita en la espalda».

languages.text: 「何を見ているんだ？この乞食ども。シフトが終わったらバラックに行け。シフトが始まったら、作業長に報告して、モティルダが背中をたたきに来る前に仕事を始めるんだ」
languages.original_text: "What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."

traits.locale_text: 「何を見ているんだ？この乞食ども。シフトが終わったらバラックに行け。シフトが始まったら、作業長に報告して、モティルダが背中をたたきに来る前に仕事を始めるんだ」

languages.text: “你们这群臭要饭的，瞎看什么呢？上完班就赶紧回营房里，等准备上班的时候，就去找领班报到，否则莫蒂尔达就要拍拍你后背了。”
languages.original_text: "What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."

traits.locale_text: “你们这群臭要饭的，瞎看什么呢？上完班就赶紧回营房里，等准备上班的时候，就去找领班报到，否则莫蒂尔达就要拍拍你后背了。”

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce que vous regardez comme ça, les gueux ? Que ceux qui ont fini leur quart retournent à la caserne. Les autres, allez vous présenter au contremaître et mettez-vous au boulot si vous voulez pas tâter de ma Motilda. »
languages.original_text: "What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce que vous regardez comme ça, les gueux ? Que ceux qui ont fini leur quart retournent à la caserne. Les autres, allez vous présenter au contremaître et mettez-vous au boulot si vous voulez pas tâter de ma Motilda. »

languages.text: "Neye bakıyorsunuz dilenci kılıklılar? Vardiyanızı bitirince doğruca kışlaya gidersiniz. Vardiyanıza başladığınızda ustabaşını görürsünüz, sonra da Motilda sırtınızı sıvazlamadan önce işe koyulursunuz."
languages.original_text: "What are you looking at, you beggars? You finish your shift, you go to the barracks. You start your shift, you check in with the foreman and get to work before Motilda comes to pat you on the back."
